description: Propp's cubic recurrence: a(0) = a(1) = a(2) = a(3) = 1; a(n)=(1+a(n-1)*a(n-2)*a(n-3))/a(n-4).
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, n = 3-n); if( n<4, 1, (a(n-1) * a(n-2) * a(n-3) + 1) / a(n-4)) } /* _Michael Somos_, Oct 16 2006 */(Haskell)a051786 n = a051786_list !! na051786_list = 1 : 1 : 1 : 1 :   zipWith div (tail $ zipWith3 (\u v w -> 1 + u * v * w)               (drop 2 a051786_list) (tail a051786_list) a051786_list)               a051786_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 07 2014
author: _Michael Somos_, Dec 09 1999
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_ at the suggestion of _Andrew Plewe_, Jun 17 2007
